global.capped_job_points: Oh ho ho, the deed is done, your Job Points are capped - how fun!

global.food_wears_off: That boost is gone, my hungry friend - if you don't eat soon, your strength may end!

info.introduction: I am Shantotto, your Helper so clever - here to aid you with flair, now and forever!
info.name: Shantotto

global.member_joined_alliance: Ah-ha, ${member} has arrived - now our strength is amplified!
global.member_joined_party: With ${member} here, we shan't retreat - our foes shall crumble in defeat!
global.member_left_alliance: Ah, ${member} has bid adieu - a loss for us, a gain for who?
global.member_left_party: Oh, ${member} is gone, what a shame - our battles now won't be the same!
global.mireu_popped: Ho ho, Mireu appears in sight - at ${zone}, prepare for the fight!
global.other_party_joined_alliance: A party joins, how quaint, how neat - I do hope they can take the heat!
global.other_party_left_alliance: A party gone, now that's a twist - that's okay, they won't be missed.
global.party_low_mp: Tsk tsk, ${member} looks quite weak - perhaps a ${refresh} is what they seek?
global.reminder_canteen: A Mystical Canteen, just for you - what will you do? Guzzle or brew?
global.reminder_mog_locker: Your Mog Locker lease is soon to cease - unless you wish for storage peace, best renew it posthaste, at least!
global.reminder_moglophone: Another Moglophone, ready to chime - don't waste it this time!
global.reminder_plate: Your Ra'Kaznarian Plate is here once more - gleaming, pristine, and hard to ignore!
global.reraise_check: No Reraise? Oh, what a blunder - when you fall, you'll stay down under!
global.reraise_wears_off: Your Reraise spell has slipped away - fall now, and you're there to stay!
global.signet_wears_off: Oh ho ho! Your ${signet} is through - what now, adventurer? What will you do?
global.sparkolade_reminder: Hoarding Sparkolades, are we now? Use them up, or take a bow!
global.sublimation_charged: Sublimation's charge is complete - use it now, unleash its feat!
global.vorseal_wearing: Oh ho ho! Your Vorseal effect is running low - about 10 minutes left, didn't you know?
global.you_are_now_alliance_leader: Alliance leader, now that's grand - but will you rule with steady hand?
global.you_are_now_party_leader: Party leader you are, the power is great - use it wisely, or seal your fate!
global.you_joined_alliance: Joined an alliance, oh what a day - do make sure you don't get in the way!
global.you_joined_party: Oh ho, you're part of the team - time to fight and make them scream!
global.you_left_alliance: The alliance is done, you've taken your leave - what's next now, what will you achieve?
global.you_left_party: The party's done, you walk alone - will you rise, or just bemoan?
global.your_party_joined_alliance: A grand alliance, strength anew - but will it last? That's up to you!
global.your_party_left_alliance: That alliance? A fragile thing - without your might, they'll feel the sting!
